entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning early this morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
